Class ConsoleOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • Output
      • ConsoleOutput

  • public class ConsoleOutput
extends Output
    This class is used to display the current state of the game on the console.

      • getTokenChar

        private static char getTokenChar(int playerID,
                                 int tokenID)
        This method returns corresponding ASCII-symbol for player tokens
        Parameters:
        playerID: - ID of player
        tokenID: - Token we want the symbol for
        Returns:
        : white numbered tokens for player 0, black numbered tokens for player 1

      • getRow

        private static int getRow(int playerID,
                          int tileID)
        returns row of a tile on te board
        Parameters:
        playerID - ID of player whos tile it is (important for private tiles)
        tileID - Index of tile
        Returns:
        0,1 or 2 depending on row

      • getColumn

        private static int getColumn(int tileID)
        returns column of a tile on te board
        Parameters:
        tileID - Index of tile
        Returns:
        0-7 depending on column

      • replace

        private static java.lang.String replace(java.lang.String s,
                                        char c,
                                        int index)
        replaces one character in string s with char c
        Parameters:
        s - String where the char should be replaced in
        c - Char that will replace the old char
        index - Position where to replace the char
        Returns:
        new String with char replaced
